body_html:
@soumith when i call ther max_unpool2d function like out=F.max_unpool2d(input,2,ouput_size=(n,n)) ,
i got the following message:

File"/home/*/torch/nn/functional.py" line 292, in max_unpool2d outputsize)
File"/home/*/torch/nn/functional.py" line252 in _unpool_output_size 
default_size.append((input_size[d+2]-1)*stride[d]+kernel_size[d]-2*padding[d])
TypeError: unsupported perand type(s) for *: 'long' and 'NoneType'.

@soumith when i call ther max_unpool2d function like out=F.max_unpool2d(input,2,ouput_size=(n,n)) ,
i got the following message:
File"/home/*/torch/nn/functional.py" line 292, in max_unpool2d outputsize)

default_size.append((input_size[d+2]-1)*stride[d]+kernel_size[d]-2*padding[d])

body:
@soumith when i call ther max_unpool2d function like` out=F.max_unpool2d(input,2,ouput_size=(n,n))` ,
 **i got the following message:**
```
File"/home/*/torch/nn/functional.py" line 292, in max_unpool2d outputsize)
File"/home/*/torch/nn/functional.py" line252 in _unpool_output_size 
default_size.append((input_size[d+2]-1)*stride[d]+kernel_size[d]-2*padding[d])
TypeError: unsupported perand type(s) for *: 'long' and 'NoneType'.
```
